item.title: 印度 RBI 在出租车应用崩溃后审查部分电子钱包
item.description: 印度最大的全电动汽车出租车服务公司突然倒闭，导致用户无法使用绑定在其账户上的资金，熟悉此事的人士称，印度央行正在仔细审查一些与电动汽车公司相关的数字钱包。【原文：India’s central bank is scrutinizing some digital wallets associated with electric-vehicle players after the sudden collapse of the country’s largest all-EV taxi service left users unable to access money tied to their accounts, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 索尼前景黯淡，关税打击达 7 亿美元
item.description: 索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp. ）对未来一年的业绩预测令人失望，美国关税负担抹杀了营业利润增长的预期。【原文：Sony Group Corp. offered an underwhelming forecast for the year ahead, with the burden of US tariffs wiping out expectations for an increase in operating profit.】

item.title: 铁矿石因贸易战停战希望而反弹至六周高位
item.description: 铁矿石因贸易紧张局势缓解而上涨，刺激了整个金属市场的乐观情绪，而全球经济增长忧虑对金属市场的打击尤为严重。【原文：Iron ore rose as trade tensions eased, spurring optimism across a metals market that has been hit especially hard by global growth worries.】

item.title: 韩国智囊团将 2025 年经济增长预测减半至 0.8%
item.description: 韩国一家国家资助的智库下调了对该国今年经济增长的展望，这反映了唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动对这个依赖贸易的国家造成的影响，因为该国的总统竞选正如火如荼地进行着。【原文：A South Korean state-funded think tank slashed its outlook for the country’s growth this year, reflecting the fallout from Donald Trump’s tariff campaign on the trade-reliant nation as its presidential race hits full swing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚昆士兰州对首次发行的欧元债券需求强劲
item.description: 澳大利亚昆士兰州在首次发行基准欧元债券时获得了强劲的需求，因为该州转向海外以扩大投资者基础。【原文：Australia’s Queensland state garnered strong demand for its first-ever benchmark euro bond issuance as it turns offshore to broaden the investor base.】

item.title: 凯雷为印度 Hexaware M&A 再融资寻求 12 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc）正在寻求约 12 亿美元的银团贷款，以对用于收购孟买软件公司 Hexaware Technologies Ltd. 的债务进行再融资。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc is seeking about $1.2 billion in a syndicated loan to refinance debt used to acquire Mumbai-based software firm Hexaware Technologies Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 千禧聘请前瑞银亚太区股票衍生品主管
item.description: 千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）聘请了瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）前亚太区股票衍生品主管，这是这家市值 730 亿美元的投资巨头为扩张而挖掘投资银行高管的最新举措。【原文：Millennium Management hired UBS Group AG’s former equity derivatives head for Asia-Pacific, the latest move by the $73 billion investment giant to tap investment bank executives for expansion.】

item.title: 中国人民银行每日人民币支持率今年首次低于预期
item.description: 在贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象导致人民币反弹的情况下，中国缩减了支撑人民币的力度，每日支撑幅度今年首次低于分析师的预期。【原文：China scaled back its efforts to buoy the yuan, with one degree of daily support missing analyst estimates for the first time this year, amid a rebound on signs of easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 印度十大富豪在经历四年来最大规模的股票上涨后，财富增加超过 160 亿美元
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台湾监管机构调查公司强迫员工销售 ETF
item.description: 台湾金融监管机构正在调查20家金融机构如何推动员工销售交易所交易基金产品，这是亚洲最大的交易所交易基金市场之一出现过度竞争的最新迹象。【原文：Taiwan’s financial regulator is probing 20 financial institutions over how they pushed staff to sell exchange-traded fund products, the latest sign of excessive competition in one of Asia’s biggest ETF markets.】

item.title: 高盛称特朗普在仔细研究文章后看好 40-50 美元的石油价格
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US President Donald Trump appears to prefer oil prices between $40 and $50 a barrel, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., citing an in-house analysis of his social-media posts on the topic.】

item.title: 中国用经验丰富的专家包围习近平的助手以达成美国协议
item.description: 中国出人意料地迅速与美国达成了削减惩罚性关税税率的协议，这使中国的谈判团队成为焦点，该团队拥有数十年的技术贸易经验，同时还有习近平主席的一位高级助手。【原文：China’s surprisingly quick agreement with the US to wind back punitive tariff rates put a spotlight on a Chinese negotiating team that features decades worth of technical trade experience alongside a top aide of President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 钴市场翘首以盼刚果计划，电池行业或将因此受到冲击
item.description: 一个行业组织表示，刚果民主共和国即将就钴出口问题做出的决定有可能导致金属价格飙升，并导致电池制造商寻求替代品。【原文：A forthcoming decision by the Democratic Republic of Congo on cobalt exports could potentially send prices for the metal soaring and lead battery makers to seek alternatives, an industry group said.】

item.title: 在特朗普的世界里，飞机是开启政治恩惠的钥匙
item.description: 事实证明，唐纳德-特朗普总统长期以来对航空世界的痴迷正成为各国政府和公司赢得其青睐的有用工具。【原文：President Donald Trump’s long-held fascination with the world of aviation is proving a useful tool for governments and companies seeking to win his favor.】

item.title: 澳大利亚就业市场紧俏，工资增速加快至 3.4
item.description: 澳大利亚今年前三个月的工资增长强于预期，凸显出该国劳动力市场在公共部门招聘浪潮的支撑下十分紧张。【原文：Australia’s wage growth was stronger than expected in the first three months of the year, highlighting the nation’s tight labor market that has been underpinned by a wave of public-sector hiring.】

item.title: 印度顶级航空航天公司看涨期权创两年新高
item.description: 在印度国有企业印度斯坦航空有限公司周三公布第四季度财报之前，看涨该公司的呼声达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Bullish calls on India’s Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd. are at the highest in more than two years ahead of the state-owned company’s fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday.】

item.title: 年度亏损后日产股价下跌，不再展望利润
item.description: 日本汽车制造商日产汽车公司公布年度净亏损为 6709 亿日元（45 亿美元），并决定不发布本财年的营业利润预期，之后该公司股价下跌。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. shares fell after the Japanese automaker posted an annual net loss of ¥670.9 billion ($4.5 billion) and decided against issuing an operating profit forecast for the current fiscal year.】

item.title: 日本主要贸易官员将缺席亚太经合组织会议，而格里尔将出席会议
item.description: 日本贸易大臣武藤洋治将缺席本周举行的贸易负责人会议，这一决定可能会降低东京与美国贸易代表杰米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）举行双边会谈的机会。【原文：Japan’s Trade Minister Yoji Muto will skip a gathering of trade chiefs this week, a decision that will likely lower Tokyo’s chances of securing an opportunity for bilateral talks with US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer.】

item.title: 美国疲软数据强化美联储降息预期，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美国通胀数据弱于预期，刺激交易商加强对美联储降息的押注后，黄金保持小幅上涨。【原文：Gold held a small gain after US inflation data came in weaker-than-expected, spurring traders to shore up bets on interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 腾讯和阿里巴巴业绩是巩固中国科技股涨势的关键
item.description: 中国科技行业两大巨头的财报将成为下一个重要观察点，从中可以看出 2025 年最热门的股票涨势之一是否重回正轨。【原文：Earnings from the two biggest names in China tech are the next big watchpoint for clues on whether one of 2025’s hottest stock rallies is back on track.】

item.title: 新西兰三月份出境人数创历史新高
item.description: 在截至 3 月份的一年中，离开新西兰的人数创下了历史新高，使新西兰的移民净增人数降至两年多来的最低水平。【原文：A record number of people left New Zealand in the year through March, reducing the net gain through immigration to the lowest in more than two years.】

item.title: 三星同意以 15 亿欧元收购德国 Fläkt 集团
item.description: 三星电子公司签署了一项协议，将以 15 亿欧元（17 亿美元）收购 FläktGroup Holding GmbH，这是该公司八年来最大的一次海外收购。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. signed an agreement to buy FläktGroup Holding GmbH for €1.5 billion ($1.7 billion), acquiring the European heating and cooling specialist in its biggest overseas takeover in eight years.】

item.title: 贸易乐观情绪和伊朗言论推动油价反弹后趋于平稳
item.description: 受贸易战乐观情绪和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对伊朗供应日益敌视的言论刺激，石油价格在经历了 10 月份以来最大的四天反弹后趋于稳定、【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest four-day rally since October, spurred by trade-war optimism and US President Donald Trump’s increasingly hostile rhetoric on Iranian supply,】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构就卖空报告起诉麦格理
item.description: 澳大利亚市场监管部门正在起诉麦格理证券（澳大利亚）有限公司（Macquarie Securities (Australia) Ltd.），指控该公司在超过 14 年的时间里虚报了数百万笔卖空交易。【原文：Australia’s markets regulator is suing Macquarie Securities (Australia) Ltd., alleging that the firm misreported millions of short sales for more than 14 years.】

item.title: Robinhood 的竞争对手 EToro 和支持者在扩大 IPO 规模后筹集了 6.2 亿美元资金
item.description: EToro Group Ltd. 及其部分股东在美国首次公开募股中筹集了近 6.2 亿美元，定价高于市场范围。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. and some of its shareholders raised nearly $620 million in an upsized US initial public offering priced above the marketed range.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德重启价值 24 亿美元的檀香山房地产综合体交易
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德地产公司（Brookfield Properties）在因关税引发的市场混乱而停止交易约一个月后，重新启动了一项价值 24 亿美元的一揽子债务计划，为檀香山阿拉莫阿那中心（Ala Moana Center）进行再融资。【原文：Brookfield Properties has revived a $2.4 billion debt package to refinance the Ala Moana Center, a sprawling mall and office complex in Honolulu, about a month after it halted the deal amid tariff-induced market disruption.】

item.title: 特朗普中东之行开启英伟达引领的人工智能交易闸门
item.description: 特朗普政府正在为两个重要的波斯湾盟国开辟一条道路，以实现它们在人工智能方面的雄心壮志；一些最大的美国科技公司正在抓住这一机遇，计划在该地区投入数十亿美元。【原文：The Trump administration is clearing a path for two key Persian Gulf allies to pursue their artificial intelligence ambitions — and some of the biggest US tech companies are seizing on that opening with plans to spend billions of dollars in the region.】

item.title: 贝恩退出 Insignia 收购要约，CC Capital 继续谈判
item.description: Insignia Financial Ltd. 表示，贝恩资本不会继续提出收购要约，目前正在与 CC Capital Partners 进行谈判。【原文：Insignia Financial Ltd. said Bain Capital is not proceeding with a takeover offer and talks are ongoing with CC Capital Partners.】

item.title: 贸易战降温，亚洲股市将延续涨势：市场综述
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战正在降温，而且迄今为止通胀数据显示影响有限，美国基准股市抹平了2025年的跌幅，亚洲股市有望延续本周的反弹势头。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to extend this week’s rebound after US benchmarks wiped out 2025’s losses on signs that President Donald Trump’s trade war is cooling and as inflation data showed limited impacts so far.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）在欺诈案中的 "恶意 "不当行为遭到法庭抨击
item.description: 新泽西州的一名联邦法官正在权衡一项不同寻常的建议，即制裁美国商品期货交易委员会，依据是一份报告称，该衍生品监管机构在 2023 年的一起欺诈案中存在重大失误，该机构应驳回该案并支付法律费用。【原文：A federal judge in New Jersey is weighing an unusual recommendation to sanction the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission, based on a report that the derivatives watchdog made such significant missteps in a 2023 fraud case that the agency should dismiss it and pay legal fees.】
